reviewText: I love christmas and everything about christmas so I always buy xmas movies to watch up to and pass christmas to keep me in the holiday spirit.
We all enjoyed watching these movies over the Christmas holiday.  It was a great deal on Amazon, too.  We were all very pleased with this purchase.
Good, wholesome, fun entertainment. Its specifically for the holiday season, but fun to watch other times,too. I would recommend this for all ages

My husband and I both love the Hallmark movies and he wanted The Most Wonderful Time of the Year, so I got it as a Christmas present for him. Getting the other three movies was a bonus as the price was great.
I liked all four of these movies some more than others but overall a really good collection of Christmas movies

My husband and I enjoy a good romance story. All provided that although
our favorite was the Christmas Kiss. The genuine and sincere character qualities
shown by "Wendy" in the story  was what drew us to appreciate this one the most.
I have vieewed these holiday movies before on TV and wanted them available to see again during future holiday seasons!
I watched all four of these movies and each one is so good!  Best of all they are movies you can watch with the whole family without worry...highly recommend!
I'm a hopeless romantic for romantic movies and I loved all these. I loved that they also involved Christmas. I loved them all.
great movies! great price!
Very good quality, was as described.
I only saw 2 of them so far.  The most wonderful time of the year and Annie Clause.  Both really good, typical Hallmark movies.
What can I say, I love these cheesy holiday movies!  I don't have cable tv and this is a great value for 4 movies.
I bought this as a gift for my mom and when she recieved it, there was two of the same movies in the set. She was so bummed.

Treated myself to this set for Christmas, but found it to have super poor sound quality, sound volume kept going up and down thru the whole first movie.  There are two movies per disc, one on either side which is unusual to begin with.  And I was looking so forward to enjoying these sweet, but sappy stories seeing that 3 out of 4 are some of my faves.  Much to my chagrin I only got thru a very frustrating viewing of A Christmas Kiss before giving up. My question to Amazon is now what?

I received this thinking there were four movies included and there was only one movie. The description and advertisement of this lists that it is a "Movie 4 Pack" Very disappointed! I usually order new Christmas movies each year and had really been looking forward to this pack.
Good movies!
I love how cheap this DVDs set was. I loved watching all of them.
I bought this set for 3 of the movies.  I have never had a DVD that I had to flip over to watch another movie.  I also didn't like all the previews.  However it's a good deal.
Always a great way to just sit back and enjoy without concern over "Hollywood" themes and unhappy lifestyles.  Truly "G" rated as I may be an adult who is interested in something everyone can watch.
I bought this 4-pack to get Holiday Engagement.

These movies are mostly clean (a bit of unnecessary fowl language in the Christmas Kiss), and I appreciate that they are appropriate for the whole family. Thanks Hallmark!

This is a great price for the set of 4 movies.
I bought it because i love : ITS THE MOST WONDERFUL TIME OF THE YEAR movie with henry winkler.uh
Absolutely wonderful, we watch  Christmas Kiss  at least two times a week...
all was great
These are some of the christmas movies I like watching.
Great movies
I love these Holiday Romance movies.  I watch them on Hallmark and than purchase them in a bundle when they come out.  These movies show how the holidays should be celebrated.  .
Out standing
Good movies.
Good Christmas shows.
The Christmas Kiss is one of my favorite I watch it about 10 times
4 great movies in 1 pack.....loved them all
I watch these movies every December
4 of the best Christmas love story movies. They'll make you laugh, cry, sigh, and be happy in the end. I literally watch them thru out the entire year whenever I need a pick me up.
Came in before scheduled so happy!!
These are four of Hallmark's best Christmas movies. So much fun to watch, while putting you into the spirit of the season.
Great to have my favorite Christmas movies at my finger tips, when I get in the mood.

Have watched only three of he movies (haven't watched Annie Claus yet), but I enjoyed all three of the others, so it was worth what I paid for it!  The Christmas Kiss I'll watch each year at Christmas, I think.
A good selection of film that you can see more than once

I LOVE THESE! I am a huge Hallmark fan anyway, but my TV has the Christmas movies playing all the time that they are on TV. I now own about 20-25 Hallmark Christmas movies and am probably not done. I watch Christmas movies all year around just for that feel good feeling they give you. We need that all year round. This set of movies is a gem, especially for less than $10. Whether you have or haven't seen this set of movies, you won't regret buying these. They are a must for any Christmas movie fan!
very good
These are all great movies and having them all in one place.
Thank you for your speedy delivery of this excellent Holiday film package. Three of the four films were excellent and the fought tolerable. I am pleased with your fine service. Well done!
Some heartwarming holiday movies!
My daughter and I try to out do each other when it comes to choosing sappy Christmas movies.  I won this year.
2 films are the standard romances you see on Hallmark TV but the one with Henry Winkler is worth the price just to watch him.

Christmas Kiss is one of my favorite Christmas movies, so I bought this set for that one. I really liked the engagement one. I haven't seen Annie Claus yet, and Most Wonderful Time of the Year was just ok. Not great. I don't really care to watch it again.
Great Christmas movies!

I loved the movies and packaging.

Thank you and Happy Holidays
I was hesitant to get this, but the price was wonderful! It worked perfectly and all the movies is what I wanted to see for the Holidays! Very Happy with my purchase!
it was a gift and they love the collection
Good wholesome collection of Christmas romance movies
5 stars!
All of the movies are enjoyable to watch.  We are glad to have it in our collection.
Really heartwarming. Sweet family films.
Great movies in one package for a great price.
Good variety Happy with it
I LOVE LOVE LOVE Christmas movies.  This was a great addition to my collection.
Loved these movies! Definitely worth watching every year!
These are very good movies with wholesome language and themes.
great movie
Loved all Four.  Great Addition to my collection.

There were three in this collection our that touched my heart, the Christmas Kiss, The Most Wonderful time of the Year and Holiday Engagement,
Loved them.
Wonderful movies; great DVD.
I love these Christmas movies.  Can't get enough of them.  Great value.
Shipping was fast and I love all of these movies!
Movies the whole family can watch with out worry! Great to share!

Buyer beware: The company that put the four films together also decided to force you to watch previews to all the films. Meaning you wait and wait for the actual movie to start. Fast forward you think? Sorry, the option is blocked so if want to see the movie, you'll have to watch the intro and yes, for two movies, each time. You can thank Gaiam Americas for this unwanted arrangement.
Great set really enjoyed watching while on the road
great christmas movie collection
loved it
Every single one of these movies on this pack are awesome! You don't always get that where all 4 are great, but these are. Loved this pack and made the holidays for us just wonderful!
Great Christmas themed movies.  Annie Claus is the best!

I enjoyed all three of the four movies.  The Annie Claus movie I didn't care for at all, but the other 3 were enjoyable to me.  In fact The Most Wonderful Time of the Year is one of my favorite Christmas movies.  For the price I paid for this is was money well spent.  I would highly recommend this DVD.
we like all 4 movie were great  watch over and over good for the whole family with happy endings to all movies
Great wholesome Christmas spirit!!!  They each had their unique spin on updated holiday spirit!  This coming from a true christmas junkie!!!  happy holidays!
i enjoyed  the  movies  and  i  purschased  one  for my  sister  and  i  will be  checking  your  site for  more  hallmark  movies
I loved all four Christmas movies. They were very enjoyable and the spirit of Christmas was  there..
Great seller and movie
Love the Hallmark channel movies!

Okay 2 of my movies keep freezing on 1Annie Claus 2 holiday Engagement, and I'm not happy with it,and I talk to someone about one of the movie and  at the time I didn't know the other one was frozen until I try to watch it
IT WAS GOOD, TO WATCH.
Great family movie collection. Good family movie night.
Very much enjoy these four holiday movies

Call me a big ol' softie, but I like to watch these feel good movies -- I welcome change from the stress and bad news we seem to get on TV's every day.  I like these movies that are packaged together because they're such a good buy.  I mostly bought this DVD for "Most Wonderful Time of the Year" and "Christmas Kiss", which I've seen for the last four or five years, and are favorites of mine.  But I really liked "Annie Claus" and "Holiday Engagement" as well, neither of which I'd seen before.
This was a perfect gift!
good moview
Good.
